content:
Sure! Here is the updated itinerary:

Day 1:

* Pick up from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Doi Inthanon (ranked #1 on TripAdvisor)
* Visit Wachirathan Waterfall (ranked #9 on TripAdvisor)
* Trekking to visit waterfall and Karen village with some viewpoints
* Lunch at a local Karen restaurant
* Visit King and Queen Pagoda
* Visit Hmong Market
* Return to Chiang Mai at 6:00 pm

Day 2:

* Pick up from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Mae Vang Elephant Sanctuary (ranked #1 on TripAdvisor)
* Lunch at a local restaurant
* Bamboo rafting in Mae Vang River
* Visit Mae Sa Snake Farm (ranked #20 on TripAdvisor)
* Return to Chiang Mai

Day 3:

* Pick up from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Wat Chedi Luang (ranked #7 on TripAdvisor)
* Visit the Bai Orchid and Butterfly Farm (ranked #3 on TripAdvisor)
* Visit the Grand Canyon Water Park (ranked #32 on TripAdvisor)
* Lunch at a local restaurant
* Visit the Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden (ranked #2 on TripAdvisor)
* Return to Chiang Mai

Day 4:

* Pick up from hotel at 9:00 am
* Visit Huay Tung Tao Sculpture Park
* Enjoy the Pongyang Jungle Coaster and Zipline (ranked #2 on TripAdvisor)
* Lunch at a local restaurant
* Visit the Night Safari (ranked #10 on TripAdvisor)
* Return to Chiang Mai

Note: Please note that the order of the attractions can be changed as per your preference, and the drive time between each destination may vary depending on traffic conditions.
